Description: At Amalfi of Glen Cove, our extensive and authentic Italian cuisine is prepared from scratch everyday using only the finest and freshest ingredients. Calzones, pasta, signature pizzas & other casual Italian eats in a comfy, counter-serve setting.
A mix of homestyle American comfort food & global specials in cozy, kid-friendly cafe near theater.
Well-known fast-food chain serving grilled burgers, fries & shakes, plus breakfast.

Upbeat counter-serve spot offering made-from-scratch Tex-Mex eats. All food is prepared daily in house, even our chips and salsa. Every morning our crew starts early, cooking soups, baking empanadas, smoking brisket, making house made guacamole to make sure your taste buds are satisfied.

HowToOrder: Phone, Grubhub, DoorDash, Seamless, Uber Eats
